text: Unlike most water parks, the water here is very shallow, like a stream. But interestingly, the design is clever with winding water. The children are very happy here. I can see many birds come here to drink water. It should be noted that water only comes out from 8-11am and 4 - 8 pm every Thursday to Sunday. Very nice place for all!

Newly opened after renovation. Kids enjoyed the park very much! Suitable for toddlers and kids as the water is shallow, flowing from the small pool to ground ‚Äî a mini pool which only one child can sit inside.
There is toilet nearby with shower facility.
Good weekend activity for kids to enjoy in nature!

Nice and wonderful to hang around.  Walk around the pond area and you may spot the otters.  Wonderful place to take a slow walk and enjoy the peace and tranquility.  This place is less crowded than the the other Bishan park across the road.  There is a Carpark nearby and toilet facilities.  You can grab drinks from the vending machine outside the toilet.  There is a schedule time for the water play.  A shelter nearly serves as a resting spot from the hot or wet weather.
It‚Äôs a wonderful place. Designed with a love and care for kids of all ages. Wish there was such a park near my place when I was youngüòù so jealous of my sonüòÇ
Nice facility for children to play at, there's a convenient bathroom nearby for cleaning up too. Would recommend bringing a change of clothes because getting wet is likely hard to avoid.
